ARABIC: وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah knows what you keep secret and what you make public.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God knows what you hide and disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah knows all that you conceal and all that you disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God knows all that you conceal or reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you do openly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And God knows what you keep secret and what you publish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Allah knoweth that which ye keep hidden and that which ye proclaim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God knows all that you conceal and all that you reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah knoweth that which ye keep secret and that which ye publish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and Allah knows whatever you hide and whatever you disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And Allah doth know what ye conceal, and what ye reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah has knowledge of all that you hide and all that you reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And God knows what you hide and what you disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you declare.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:19] And God knows what you keep secret and what you disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Allah knoweth that which ye keep hidden) of good or evil (and that which ye proclaim) of good or evil.
